item.title: Introducing Varsity Live
item.description: If you want to learn anything about trading, investing, and personal finance, I don’t think there’s a better place than @ZerodhaVarsity. The idea of Varsity began with a random email I sent to @karthikrangappa in 2014, and today, it’s one of the most popular free and open resources for all things stock markets, not just in India but maybe globally. The website has over 15 comprehensive modules and gets millions of hits.
